professional_summary: Results-driven Data Analytics and Information Systems professional with a strong foundation in Data engineering, Advanced analytics, and Machine learning. Experienced in developing and implementing advanced ML models, including BERT-based email phishing detection and GPU-optimized AI solutions. Skilled in leveraging big data technologies, cloud platforms, and business intelligence tools to drive data-driven decision-making. Proven track record of enhancing operational efficiency and customer retention through predictive analytics and NLP-powered sentiment analysis. Adept at conducting cutting-edge research and optimizing AI performance in high-performance computing environments

masters.degree: Master of Science in Data Analytics & Information Systems

certifications.name: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2024 Generative AI Professional

graduate_research.title: Graduate Research Assistant - Machine Learning
graduate_research.company: Department of Information Systems and Analytics, Texas State University
responsibilities: Developed a BERT-based ML model for email phishing detection, leveraging NLP techniques to reduce phishing attacks
Designed and implemented a risk scoring module combining ML algorithms with rule-based analysis to enhance phishing detection accuracy
Established model risk management framework, including validation techniques, drift monitoring, and governance structure, to ensure model reliability and regulatory compliance

hpc_research.title: High-Performance GPU Computing Research Assistant
hpc_research.company: Department of Information Systems and Analytics, Texas State University
responsibilities: Mastered supercomputing, Linux, file system navigation, and LEAP 2 Cluster access and implemented Python environments
Utilized SLURM Manager for scripting, debugging, job submission and trained AI models on LEAP 2 cluster, applying multi-threading and multi-processing concepts
Optimized AI performance using GPU computing and LEAP 2 partitions and contributed to HPC infrastructure improvements for AI methods

data_analyst.title: Research Data Analyst

responsibilities: Led ML-driven predictive analytics project analyzing customer data, increasing targeted marketing efficiency by 22% and customer retention by 15%
Created Tableau data visualization dashboard consolidating 12 data sources, reducing report generation by 40% and enhancing real-time decision-making
Performed NLP analysis on tweets for social media sentiment, identifying market trends leading to 30% higher adoption rate for new product lines

Integrated Oracle Vector Store and Cohere's LLM API for efficient similarity search
Implemented RAG application for improved information retrieval and response generation

adobe_case.title: Text Data Mining and Machine Learning Optimization - Adobe Systems
adobe_case.description: Developed a framework for categorizing unorganized Adobe support cases, achieving 90% accuracy in problem classification
achievements: Implemented MLPClassifier and GridSearchCV for feature extraction and hyperparameter optimization
Refined LLM with 92% precision for Adobe's support needs
Improved classification accuracy by 30% and reduced issue identification time by 40%
